mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge_vector ( id, knowledge_base_id, content, metadata, embedding, file_name, file_type, create_time, update_time, deleted ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{knowledgeBaseId}, #{content}, #{metadata}, #{embedding}::vector, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{deleted} )
mapper.update: UPDATE knowledge_vector SET content = #{et.content}, metadata = #{et.metadata}, embedding = #{et.embedding}::vector, file_name = #{et.fileName}, file_type = #{et.fileType}, update_time = #{et.updateTime} WHERE id = #{et.id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM knowledge_vector WHERE knowledge_base_id = #{knowledgeBaseId} AND deleted = 0

SELECT id, knowledge_base_id, content, metadata, file_name, file_type, create_time, update_time, 1 - (embedding <=> #{embedding}::vector) as similarity FROM knowledge_vector WHERE knowledge_base_id = #{knowledgeBaseId} AND deleted = 0 AND embedding IS NOT NULL ORDER BY embedding <=> #{embedding}::vector LIMIT #{topK}
